bug.author: ignaciofls
bug.description: It doesnt find the link in "Projects using Azure Machine Learning" section Visit following repos to see projects contributed by Azure ML users: AMLSamples Number -> broken

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ignaciofls>@ignaciofls</denchmark-link> we will review your feedback and get back to you shortly. Thanks.
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/DebFro>@DebFro</denchmark-link> please do you know who's the appropriate POC to update the link?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ignaciofls>@ignaciofls</denchmark-link> I will have the page updated. Here is the new link <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/MLOps/tree/master/examples>https://github.com/microsoft/MLOps/tree/master/examples</denchmark-link>
This is also broken in the project readme.md which links to following: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/AMLSamples>https://github.com/Azure/AMLSamples</denchmark-link>
